name: aquasuite

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix aquasuite-api install && npm --prefix aquasuite_app/web_v1 install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c blue,green "npm --prefix aquasuite-api run dev" "npm --prefix aquasuite_app/web_v1 run dev"

description: AquaSuite is the SwimLabs operations web app. v0.1 ships the Announcer-style roster UX across all locations, with Westchester-specific Announcer visibility, staff directory + instructor alias mapping, and Gmail-based client intake ingestion.
